LanguageData.AdvancedProtsAnimalsCF.label: <color=#828ddd>Animal Bionics</color>
LanguageData.AdvancedProtsAnimalsCF.description: The research unlocks advanced bionic parts and organs for animals.
LanguageData.BattleBoostersAnimalsCF.label: <color=#d3308f>Battle boosters</color>
LanguageData.BattleBoostersAnimalsCF.description: Allows to make body part battle boosters - enhancers which increase damage resistance of an animal by partly metallizing its bones and tissues.
LanguageData.SimpleProtsAnimalsCF.label: <color=#84b0e0>Animal Prosthetics</color>
LanguageData.SimpleProtsAnimalsCF.description: Unlocks construction of an animal lab, allowing to make simple animal prostheses.
